participant_abstract.sent: We discussed the various options we face regarding each aspect of the remote control.

This included more technical aspects of the design including he power supply and tecnology used inside, the practical aspects of the design such as the way the buttons may be labelled and finally the aesthetic design and how the product may be marketed.
For my particular area we were able to establish the fundamental components required for the design and I now know what will be incorporated into my part of the remote control.

participant_actions.sent: Both designers will be making a prototype model of the remote control and the market designer will be looking more at how the product will be marketed.
The project leader will probably be thinking about how the aspects will come together for the next meeting (but i'm not entirely sure).

participant_decisions.sent: A standard rubber casing - with a single curve and rubber buttons - to fit the current and hopefully future trends.
+ linked to the above to use the simplest and cheapest circuit board.
To keep the design simple enough - and to make sure all the buttons are clearly marked and easy to interpret.
To use a kinetic - not a standard battery - power supply.

participant_problems.sent: Trying to decide in a short space of time which aspects of the design people prefered.
Discussing some issues for too long and others not for long enough.
A lack of direction in the meetings.
